title: Officials say regular checks will ensure better compliance in PM E-DRIVE
description: The government will conduct bi-annual inspections to ensure companies receiving subsidies under the PM E-DRIVE scheme comply with localisation norms. This Rs 10,900 crore initiative aims to promote clean mobility by subsidising electric buses, trucks, ambulances, two and three wheelers. The scheme also includes support for hybrid engine ambulances and incentives for scrapping old trucks.
